title: One should not delay the Fast until the Adhaan Finishes - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: I'm aware that there are some Muslims who believe that you can eat and drink until the F Adan ends and there are some people who when they can hear various Adan of different Moss from the house they wait till they hear the end of the last Adan so if they can hear five six Adan they wait till the last Adan ends till that time they eat and drink in fact this is not proved from any of the Hadith of the prophet and anyone who know awaits a new thing in the de it has to be rejected it's mentioned in the Hadi of bukari volume number 3 Hadith number 2697 that anyone who innovates a new thing in the dean it has to be rejected in fact it's clearly mentioned in the Quran in Surah Bak chapter number two verse number 187 that eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct to you from the black thread that means the moment Dawn breaks moment you hear the Adan you have to stop eating
